scripts.build-navbar: node-sass --output-style compressed bulma.sass dist/navbar-min.css && css-to-lit-js ./dist/navbar-min.css -ext ts --outdir ../../web/src/app/styles
scripts.build-libs: concat -o dist/libs.css ext/modern-normalize.css ext/bootstrap-grid.min.css node_modules/kangxi-editor/dist/editor.css && postcss dist/libs.css > dist/libs-min.css && css-to-lit-js dist/libs-min.css -ext ts --outdir ../../web/src/app/styles
scripts.build: rm -rf ./dist && yarn build-navbar && yarn build-kangxi && yarn build-libs
